articles.title: Soaring prices for everything used to make food brings more inflation
articles.description: Russia’s invasion of Ukraine has taken things to another level, sending markets soaring for fertilizers and for the fuels needed to run farm machinery. Inflation is so rampant that even with rising food prices, farmers are facing increasingly tough margins.
articles.content:
The price of everything that goes into producing crops is surging, threatening to further fan global food inflation.
